data.name: DiceRoller
data.description:
Shake Some Dice & Enjoy the Beach!
As the sun slowly sets and the comfortable sea breeze blows over your body on the Gold Coast, you wear a sexy bikini, bathing in the lazy sunshine. Light music reaches your ear from a pub while your friends and you play the world-famous dice game. The ice in the whisky on your left hand is gradually melting away while the dice are flying in the hot air as you shake the cup with ardent passion. The sound of dice flowing in the hot air and the laughter of friends will make you forget any worries in life. Just enjoy this sheer joy and pleasure.
Function Update:
-New Sunshine Beath Scene
-Bingo Multiplayer Mode
Key Features:
-Multiple Modes Available: Sunshine Beach & Deluxe Casino
-Online Mode: Random Match & Play with Friends
-Real-time Voice Chat & Analyze Your Opponent's Strategy
-Party Atmosphere & Immersive Social Experience
-Intelligent scoreboard helps you optimize combinations and check scores at any time.

Rolling the Dice now!
